Description:
We’re looking for a Telesales Manager who can help our client to increase sales and grow the business.Tasks.Acquiring new clients and closing deals.
Coordinate daily workflow with the team
Monitoring the performance of the team.
Building and maintaining long-term customer relations 
Preparing and presenting detailed and accurate sales reports 
Achieving sales targets.Skills
Skills: The ideal candidate will have experience in sales management and be able to motivate and lead a team of salespeople.

Bachelor’s degree in related field.
equivalent work experience, preferably in business development, sales, marketing
4+ years of experience in a sales role with prospecting experience
Experience in cold calling, warm calling and initiating business
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Highly organized and detail-oriented
Experience with a variety of financing products such as tawarq 
Results-driven individual with a proven track record in sales & achieving targets.
